author: depasse
body:
#### PR description:
in CondTools/Ecal, add feature to automatic switch 4 hlt preshower tags when switching from low gain to high gain and vice-versa 

#### PR validation:

Test on local sqlite files with many configurations : gain not changed, wrong iov number, gain change : tag updated.
title: ECAL : automatic Ecal Preshower Gain Switching in DB, by O2O
